description: Merino Sport 150 fabric helps with breathability, temperature regulation, and odor control through responsibly sourced Merino wool while offering the quicker dry times of polyester. This men’s tee is designed with a cut that allows you bulk-free room to move, as well as thoughtful seam construction that helps prevent chafing and increase comfort. And it’s all presented with an edgy graphic that speaks to your love of the mountains. Whether it’s for your next gym workout or an afternoon on the trails, reach for their Men’s Merino Sport 150 go far. feel good.™ Summit Short Sleeve Graphic Tee and enjoy the feeling of softness and comfort.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Go Far, Feel Good Summit SS Graphic Tee - Mens
